titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated below caption title: Nouember 12. In the eleuenth yeere of His Maiesties reigne ..
